title: Niagara Launcher ‘Spring Update’ adds deeper Digital Wellbeing integration, more
content:
Unlike most other launchers you’ll use on Android, the Niagara Launcher “Spring Update” has been detailed with a number of changes and tighter integration with some system services.

more…

The post Niagara Launcher ‘Spring Update’ adds deeper Digital Wellbeing integration, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The "Spring Update" for Niagara Launcher is adding a number of tweaks and integrations to improve the third-party home screen replacement.
